docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

apis.short_description: Import puppet classes from puppet proxy.
Import puppet classes from puppet proxy for an environment
Import puppet classes from puppet proxy for an environment

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: except
params.description: Optional comma-delimited string containing either ‘new’, ‘updated’, or ‘obsolete’ that is used to limit the imported Puppet classes
